<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get OSPF Config from NB (v2.0)</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/v2.0/api/tenants/{tenant_id}/sites/{site_id}/elements/{element_id}/ospfglobalconfigs/{ospf_config_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



List a specific OSPF config from NB.

## Request

Successful Operation

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"cost"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The Cost range, which is 1 - 65535.\n","type":"integer"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"dead_interval"} required={false} schemaName={"int32"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The number of seconds that a neighbor router waits for a hello packet from the device before declaring the router down. range is 1-65535, Default is 40.\n","format":"int32","type":"integer"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"hello_interval"} required={false} schemaName={"int32"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The interval in seconds at which the OSPF process sends hello packets to its directly connected neighbors (the range is 1 - 65535; the default is 10).\n","format":"int32","type":"integer"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"id"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The OSPF config ID.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"md5_key_id"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"MD5 Key ID between 1 and 255 and an MD5 Secret of up to 16 characters. The MD5 password you specify will be applied to the messages exchanged with the peer.\n","type":"integer"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"md5_secret"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The MD5 secret key of 16 characters. The MD5 password specified is applied to the messages exchanged with the peer.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"prefix_adv_type_to_lan"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The prefix advertisement type to LAN. \n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"retransmit_interval"} required={false} schemaName={"int32"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The length of time, in seconds, that OSPF waits to receive a link-state advertisement (LSA) from a neighbor before retransmitting it (the range is 1 - 65535; the default is 5).\n","format":"int32","type":"integer"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"router_id"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The Router ID. IP address and ION device's OSPF ID.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"transmit_delay"} required={false} schemaName={"int32"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The length of time an LSA is delayed seconds before being sent out of an interface (range is 1 - 65535; default is 1). \n","format":"int32","type":"integer"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"cost\": 0,\n  \"dead_interval\": 0,\n  \"hello_interval\": 0,\n  \"id\": \"string\",\n  \"md5_key_id\": 0,\n  \"md5_secret\": \"string\",\n  \"prefix_adv_type_to_lan\": \"string\",\n  \"retransmit_interval\": 0,\n  \"router_id\": \"string\",\n  \"transmit_delay\": 0\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
